categories: Category:Grand Army of the Republic units

nodes.text: Wildfire was a clone unit within the Grand Army of the Republic.

Along with Calm Tree and Snow Wolves, Wildfire was one of the clone units that were dispatched to aid Obi-Wan Kenobi, Anakin Skywalker and Ahsoka Tano on the raid on Dr. Nuvo Vindi's laboratory on Naboo.
